attributes.action: Leave the EU With or Without a Deal to Honour the Will of the People
attributes.additional_details:
The referendum turnout was 71.8%, with more than 30 million people voting. Leave 17,410,742 Remain 16,141,241

attributes.background: A referendum was held on Thursday 23 June, 2016, to decide whether the UK should leave or remain in the European Union. Leave won by 51.9% to 48.1%.
